text:
Oscar Insurance is a startup using technology, data & design to change the way people find and access care. We are disrupting the healthcare industry by putting people first, not business and cost.

https://www.hioscar.com

We're currently hiring for a variety of Full-time/Onsite roles in our New York City office, and now our new Engineering outpost in Los Angeles (Culver City)
